CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Since the open - circuit voltage V oc of bulk heterojunction ( BHJ ) PSCs is positively correlated to the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and the HOMO energy level of the donor polymer , a higher V oc for PzNDTDTBObased polymer solar cells could be anticipated due to the lowerlying HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| bulk heterojunction (BHJ) PSCs |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| acceptor polymer |
| donor polymer |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| bulk heterojunction (BHJ) PSCs |
| PzNDTDTBO |

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Since the open - circuit voltage V oc of bulk heterojunction ( BHJ ) PSCs is positively correlated to the difference between the LUMO energy level of the acceptor and the HOMO energy level of the donor polymer , a higher V oc for PzNDTDTBObased polymer solar cells could be anticipated due to the lowerlying HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| open-circuit voltage (V oc) |
| bulk heterojunction (BHJ) |
| LUMO energy level of the acceptor |
| HOMO energy level of the donor polymer |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| lowerlying HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO |
| acceptor polymer |
| donor polymer |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| open-circuit voltage (V oc) |
| LUMO energy level of the acceptor |
| HOMO energy level of the donor polymer |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| lowerlying HOMO energy level of PzNDTDTBO |

Note: In this context, "bulk heterojunction (BHJ)" and "polymer solar cells" are not material properties, but rather the type of material system and device, respectively. Therefore, they have been removed from the table.
